name: Avalon (itch)
description:
Keyd Studio presents: Avalon

Avalon is a retro platform game with many adventures. With it's amazing graphics and pixel art style, Avalon mixes the ancient and the new in one game. Fight with your warrior against the evil and bring peace back again. Discover all the misteries in this incredible universe!
Download it now!

Game modes:

STORY: Collect all the itens and secrets of this adventure
SPEEDRUN: Complete the levels as fast as you can. Challenge your friends and see who finishes first! PLAY in more than 30 fun levels made by hand!

FIGHT against mistical evil creatures.
FIND new mechanics and enemies through your journey.

Characteristics:

An adventure for players of all ages.
Run, wait for the right moment, deflect and jump!
Enjoy yourself for hours descovering the Avalon misteries
Play now!
